TopicTitle: Is there any KW Rocketry ships to download?

Articles.Content:
Is there any KW Rocketry ships out there?

Post in the comments below:
Can you please reply? It's been a long time.

I wouldn't call 15 minutes a very long time. At any rate, check out the spaceship exchange. You might have to go digging between "modded" ship threads to find one using KW parts. As far as I know there isn't a dedicated KW ship thread...the parts for KW aren't much different than stock other than different textures and slightly more powerful engines. If you want inspiration for KW ships you may as well just look at stock examples but replace the stock parts with KW.
I guess I'm not the most patient person.
In the KW Rocketry .zip download there should be a folder labelled "ships" this goes in the saves/(your save name here) folder.

Thank you! But I don't want this thread closed yet, there might be some other crafts that some other person has for a download.

Once again,

Thank you!
